title: Rg = Rate for land in Rs
clause_text: Rg = Rate for land in Rs. per sq.m. as per ASR of generating plots in generating year. Rr = Rate for land in Rs. per sq.m. as per ASR of receiving plot in generating year.
section: Formula: X = (Rg / Rr) x Y Where,

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
